title: The Martian
plot_summary: An astronaut is stranded on Mars and must find a way to survive until rescue.

title: 12 Angry Men
plot_summary: A jury deliberates over the fate of a teenager accused of murder.

title: Inception
plot_summary: A thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets but is given an inverse task.

title: Titanic
plot_summary: A young couple falls in love aboard the ill-fated Titanic.

title: The Godfather
plot_summary: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control to his son.

title: Avengers: Endgame
plot_summary: Superheroes band together to undo the actions of a devastating villain.

title: Forrest Gump
plot_summary: Life story of a slow-witted but kind man from Alabama who witnesses history unfold.

title: Jurassic Park
plot_summary: Scientists clone dinosaurs for a theme park but chaos ensues.

title: The Dark Knight
plot_summary: Batman battles the Joker, a criminal mastermind sowing chaos in Gotham.

title: The Matrix
plot_summary: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation controlled by machines.
